and struggling to find its direction
this man says he has the answers and has
taken on the leader head-to-head for the

other to prove their leadership will

a question about division in the party
that revealed once more the gulf between

good thing if Labour MPs got behind

than briefed against them all the time
I understand political differences and I

and seventy two Labour MPs voted no
confidence in your leadership now
they're not read Tory's these aren't

in power
they're not Blair right they just Labour

points it was personal
allegations of anti-semitism have dumped

Smith's comments on this through both

I've only remembered in the last nine

I want our party to be inclusive open

there is one major policy well of hair
